p: Brasilimeria assu Queiroz & Zeppelini sp. nov. [urn:lsid:zoobank.org:act:71CA9B58-E2FE-4BC5-9D8B-C7CAB214167D] Holotype female, Brazil. Serra dos Órgãos National Park, Teresópolis municipality, Rio de Janeiro: litter and soil of Brazilian Páramos (high altitude) 2129m above sea level, 22°27'31.21"S 43°1'43.21"W, 2.Feb.2019, Queiroz, G.C. leg. Sample 82 Collembola Collection/MNRJ. Paratype: same data as Holotype.
